title: Bug 109718 - Tips in text item shows content in one line instead of given format
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result:
Tips shows the content in the given format.

Actual Result:
Tips shows the content in one line.
OB: When a large amount of content is put in the text item, the tips for the text item show the content in one line.
EB: The tips for the text item should show the content in the given format and handle large content properly.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Put a large amount of content in a text item.
3. Save the text item.
4. Put the mouse pointer on the text item to display the tips.

Expected result: The tips show the content in the given format and handle large content properly.

Actual result: The tips show the content in one line instead of the given format.
